review_blob: A lingering tartness at the back of the mouth with musk,  rose and sweet woodsy finish   true to type Scrumpy with a barely perceptible prickle of carbonation, overall a noble attempt certainly would disagree on the claim of 100% apples there is a taste in the finish that gives it away  a proportion of fruit concentrate has been used.  That being said the product is better than most attempts.  Worth a revisit.

Bottle. Pepperberry hard to pick but is faintly there.  Colour  was good head retention is to standard.  Sickly/rich malty, medium body prunes, nuts, vegemite and very earthy sandy finish.
points for effort JS.
